mapper.select: select schedule.id AS scheduleId, tm.id AS tourId, tm.title, tm.description , tm.search_priority AS searchPriority, tm.start_datetime AS tourStartDateTime, tm.arrive_datetime AS tourArriveDateTime, td.daily_tour_id AS place_tourId, td.id AS placeIndicator, td.place_id AS placeId, td.place_name AS plceName, td.place_address AS placeAddress, td.coord_x AS coordX, td.coord_y AS coordY, td.index, td.start_datetime AS placeStartDateTime, td.stay_time AS stayTime from schedule left outer join daily_tour_mst tm on(tm.schedule_id = schedule.id) left outer join daily_tour_detail td on(tm.id = td.daily_tour_id) where schedule.id = #{scheduleId} and schedule.user_id = #{userId} and td.deleted = 0 order by tourId asc, td.index asc;
mapper.insert: insert into daily_tour_mst values( 0, #{scheduleId}, #{title}, #{description}, #{searchPriority}, #{startDateTime}, #{arriveDateTime}, now(), now(), 0, null );
mapper.select: select id from daily_tour_mst where schedule_id = #{scheduleId} and deleted = 0 order by reg_date desc;
mapper.update: update daily_tour_mst set search_priority = #{searchPriority}, start_datetime = #{startDateTime}, arrive_datetime = #{arriveDateTime}, update_date = now() where id = #{id};
update daily_tour_detail set index = #{index}, start_datetime = #{startDateTime}, stay_time = #{stayTime}, update_date = now() where id = #{id};
mapper.insert:
insert into daily_tour_detail values( 0, #{item.tourId}, #{item.placeId}, #{item.placeAddress}, #{item.coordX}, #{item.coordY}, #{item.index}, #{item.startDateTime}, #{item.stayTime}, now(), now(), 0, null )
;
insert into daily_tour_detail values( 0, #{tourId}, #{placeId}, #{placeAddress}, #{coordX}, #{coordY}, #{index}, #{startDateTime}, #{stayTime}, now(), now(), 0, null );
mapper.update: update daily_tour_detail set deleted = 0, deleted_datetime = now() where id = #{id};
